testnet.title: Message from the founder
testnet.description: Thank you for trying out Dango‚Äôs first ever testnet! The purpose of testnet-1 is for testing the basic infrastructure of Dango chain, including consensus, smart contract engine, and indexer. As such, user-facing features are very limited. The coming testnet-2 (expected in June/July) will add our flagship product, the Dango DEX. Then, testnet-3 (August/September) will add margin trading. For now, you can sign up, open subaccounts, and transfer tokens, that‚Äôs it. Upon your first login, you will receive some fake tokens (fake BTC, fake ETH, ...) to play with. Make sure to complete the Galxe quests[ADD LINK] and mint your limited time NFT! güç°

match.step=0: crypto assets, real world assets, and derivatives in Dango‚Äôs blazingly fast exchange. Enjoy deep liquidity, fast execution, and fair prices.
match.step=1: with Dango‚Äôs unified trading account with low cost and high capital efficiency. Spot, perps, vaults, one account, under one unified margin system.
match.step=2: passive yields on your idle assets by depositing in Dango‚Äôs vaults. Provide liquidity to facilitate trades, or participate in complex strategies operated by professional traders.

match.step=0: Choose a sign in credential. You can add or remove credentials afterwards.

match.step=0: Select your account type to interact within the entire ecosystem
match.step=1: Fund your first spot account, you‚Äôll be able to create another account later.

match.accountType=spot: Can hold any asset and partake in any activity; cheapest gas cost; can only take over-collateralized loans.
match.accountType=margin: Can take under-collateralized loans up to 5x leverage; can only hold whitelisted assets and partake in whitelisted activities.

keyManagment.title: Key Management
keyManagment.description: Easily add or delete passkeys to manage access to your account. Each passkey is vital for secure logins, ensuring only you can access your account.
